question.content: For which of the following reasons are you planning to take leave?
helpText: Learn more about Paid Family and Medical Leave benefits eligibility.

options.label: Birth, adoption, or placement of a foster child
options.message: If approved, you may be covered up to 12 weeks by the PFML program. This benefit will be available starting January 1, 2021.

options.label: Personal serious health condition
options.message: If approved, you may be covered up to 20 weeks by the PFML program. This benefit will be available starting January 1, 2021.

options.label: Caring for a family member with a serious health condition
options.message: If approved, you may be covered up to 12 weeks by the PFML program. This benefit will be available starting July 1, 2021.

options.label: Family member called to active duty in the armed forces
options.message: If approved, you may be covered up to 12 weeks by the PFML program. This benefit will be available starting January 1, 2021.

options.label: Caring for a family member who serves in the armed forces
options.message: If approved, you may be covered up to 26 weeks by the PFML program. This benefit will be available starting January 1, 2021.

options.label: Other
options.message: You may not be covered by the PFML Program. For more information please visit our Paid Family and Medical Leave benefits eligibility page.
